title: Panama
summary: Panama is a country in Central America. The capital is Panama City. Population: 4.1 million. Area: 75,417 km².

images.alt: The flag of Panama is composed of four equal rectangular areas — a white rectangular area with a blue five-pointed star at its center, a red rectangular area, a white rectangular area with a red five-pointed star at its center, and a blue rectangular area — in the upper hoist side, upper fly side, lower fly side and lower hoist side respectively.

attribution.note: National flags are in the public domain.
